name: Chili Labs
description:
We help companies to plan, build and launch native apps from end to end.
 
Everyone and everything at Chili Labs is driven by passion to mobile apps, wearable gadgets, ML, AR and all other newest tech. Our core mission is building years strong relationships between good companies that we work with.
 
With an incredible in-house team of 23 talented developers, designers, engineers we have released more than 12 different mobile products in a year 2018.
 
Our key focus is on Finance, E-commerce, Messengers and Insurance industries.
 
We share our experience with other developers, communities. That’s why we organize “Mobile Developers Latvia” Meetup, contribute to open source and created a project that already helps rescues, police and volunteers to save missing people's lives in the Baltic states.
